references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper is foundational for text-to-image generation using CLIP latents, a technique heavily influencing the field and directly relevant to GenArtist's approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, a core technology used extensively in GenArtist and the broader field.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This pivotal work demonstrated the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image synthesis, forming the basis for many subsequent advancements including those utilized in GenArtist.
This foundational paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the theoretical underpinning of many image generation techniques including those used in GenArtist.

references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to GenArtist's image editing capabilities, focusing on learning to follow image editing instructions which is directly applicable to GenArtist's multi-step editing process.
